website_summaries.verdict: The Bose Frames sunglasses hold promise for an AR-capable future, but until then, they simply double as pretty good headphones.
pros: Clear, crisp audio that allows you to hear your surroundings
Easy to control with a single button

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for vocal listening.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good sound quality although they do lack that low end punch in ear buds offer. I listen to a lot of vocal podcasts when running or walking which they excel at. It's quite strange to hear your chosen soundtrack clearly yet still hear the world around you. I opted for the Alto which come up quite large. Perfect for my large head but my wife can't wear them. She has asked for a pair of the smaller Rondo frames though. All in all, really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Surry

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since sliced bread.... in fact a knife even !! :-)
customer_reviews.text: Only got these today so not had too long to try them however they are amazing !!! Without anything on or in your ears your having your own private disco. Phone calls are clear and audible the person on the end of the phone is non the wiser that this is coming through a set of headphones... sorry ... sun glasses. I love them well done Bose looking forward to the Bose AR features coming soon !!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: That Good, the Amazon driver stole them
customer_reviews.text: Replacement sent by Amazon. Had a similar pair from Oakley circ 2008 that had an MP3 player. These look and sound far better. You don’t look a complete moron. Oh ya and I had some google glass for a few weeks. Sound quality is actual good. These are perfect for the guy with a nagging wife, you don’t have to listen to her!
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are brilliant. Usual Bose sound quality and comfy when on. There is some slight sound leakage but not significant and certainly not enough to disturb someone more than a few feet away. It's a shame that the AR app is only currently available for Apple products as I haven't been able to try it to get to it's additional features. Battery life looks good at about 3.5 to 4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jelley

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is amazing. And being able to hear normal sounds around is a big plus, especially when cycling. The (gradient?) microphone also seems to work well for calls. And for people like me who find that all in-ear headphones fall out the stability is a big benefit. But the sound is amazing - everyone I have demonstrated them to is impressed- try to try them! The software and simple off technique works well. FYI battery life when playing sound is about the suggested 2 hours - but battery life when just connected for satnav or waiting for phone calls is much much longer.
customer_reviews.author: W. J. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Simple set up
customer_reviews.text: I've got other Bose equipment so I had high expectations - and I wasn't disappointed. I didn't expect massive bass sound but the quality was more than acceptable, Bose seem to be able to squeeze every ounce of sound out of small speaker formats. The glasses were comfortable to wear and look stylish enough. Battery life could be better - half a day on the beach rather than a full one! Only downsides are a disconcerting reflection on the inside of the lens, must be the angle they sit on, and a loss of connectivity sometimes. All in all I'm glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Beware of online reviews! These do NOT sound good.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I'm a complete gadget freak and was very very excited by these after watching a lot of online video reviews. My conclusion was that the online reviews must have been paid for reviews. The glasses themselves look okay considering what you're getting but the sound quality is nowhere near as good as described online and more inline with what you would expect....like holding a set of small earphones away from your ear. Very disappointed and returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: No Android AR apps
customer_reviews.text: Nice concept but there are no AR apps for Android just yet (even though product has been available in US for a year already). Bose have stated they don't have a date for this which basically means there is no AR experience to be had if you have an Android phone... for that reason I exercised the 30 day trial guarantee and returned this product for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Nickdel

customer_reviews.title: Love these audio sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: As I am writing this review I'm listing to music on my Bose Frames. Good sunglasses surprising sound from them far better than I imagined they would be. Perfect for a sunny day when it's too hot for head phones. HiFi they are not and for the price you'll get much better head phones but for wearing in the sun and street brillant. So not a headphone replacement but a very usefull additional head set. As sun glasses very good I have bought the extra mirrored silver lenses but standard are perfectly adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Walton

customer_reviews.title: Truly Dreadful. What were Bose thinking?
customer_reviews.text: Saw these and being a tech junkie had to try them. What a bad idea! The sound fires out of tiny speakers in the arms near your ears. the quality was okay-ish but lacking in base. And oomph. Loud if you cupped your hand around your ears but everyone around you could hear what you were listening too. Total waste Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are brilliant - love them. Great for running and cycling and the sound is first class. At last there is a way to avoid sweaty headphone...this is it. Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product quality
customer_reviews.text: When you buy Bose you expect quality, these are very good in both function and purpose, they are a nice fit (check sizing before ordering ) as the directional microphones need to be in the right place. Syncing to my I Phone was simple and very quick, every time i turn them on they sync within seconds automatically, they retain the connection, although they take some getting used to as they turn off if taken off and placed down. Overall, i am pleased, they are a good look and people don't realise your wearing them, you have to be fairly close to hear the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost amazing
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what they say they do. But I did have a couple of connections issues and turning them off while on the move isn’t easy. But very good sound quality and the music sounds like it is in your head but people around can pretty much hear your listening to music. Looking forward to seeing future iterations which are slightly less bulky and with more augmentation.
customer_reviews.author: HughMaster

customer_reviews.title: good job
customer_reviews.text: i got the alto frames from bose very easy to set up and have to say the sound is very nice and the good thing is the bluetooth and the sound was first class well thats bose for you i put my bose alto sunslassess to the test nice sound from them and the good thing nobody knows that there are speakers built in
customer_reviews.author: jack delaney

customer_reviews.title: Another great speaker idea from Bose
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love them! I wear ray bans so very similar. Great sound and discreet too. I actually use mine for making calls more than listening to music
customer_reviews.author: Swiss Tony

customer_reviews.title: Failure in every aspect
customer_reviews.text: I was si disappointed with this framed. I am big fan of BOSE products but I had to return this 1 hr after they were delivered. It kept disconnecting every 2 mins, it sound like bluetooth speaker and someone who is 10 meters away can hear what you are listening to. The frame itself seem flimsy and had very low confident with the durability (the way it feels). I am sorry but this is a really failure in every aspect. I rather buy proper headphones and sunglasses separately.
customer_reviews.author: Ben.eshaq

customer_reviews.title: My new glasses
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Took them to a high street opticians and had clear transition prescription lenses fitted so now I wear these to take calls, listen to music and to run the audio for videos on my phone and laptop. There is little to no adjustment in the frames so if they don’t fit straight away send them back - if they’re too big the alto style is smaller. Audio lacks bass due to the limitations of the design but the sound quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Chem lab

customer_reviews.title: great sound sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: if you like to listen to music/speak when travelling and do not wish to wear too many gadgets on your head this is a must. Top quality sound (just cup your hands around your ears while they play and you will see what I mean; battery life is short though
customer_reviews.author: cpminas

customer_reviews.title: great way to enjoy music on sunny days
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is very good considering the limitations of building speakers into sunglasses. Passers by won’t notice the sound when set at around 50% volume. The convenience of having music built on the go is fantastic and I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: sonny

customer_reviews.title: Superb headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Very good , I used them on the beach and round the pool daily, sound great, obviously not as much bass as conventional head phone's, but you expect that... Very comfortable, after a while normal headphones hurt my ears .. I would definitely recommend trying then out.
customer_reviews.author: clarkey

customer_reviews.title: pricey but love them
customer_reviews.text: day after I bought them for £199, amazon dropped the price to £169! but they are brilliant, clear crystal quality in sound and vision, a little heavy and battery - short life, but rechargeable. hardly dare use them in public for fear of damage or loss
customer_reviews.author: Kell

customer_reviews.title: wouldn’t want to be without these now
customer_reviews.text: had mixed feelings at first these are nicely put together the sound isn’t super loud and the bass drops off at higher volume but there is a sweet spot and there so handy good for quieter environments but for me they passed the dance test they made me move i can’t ask anything more from my sunglasses
customer_reviews.author: luna 616

customer_reviews.title: A great product to buy !
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, when I saw some other reviews I was VERY surprised. They have brilliant sound quality, and you can nearly hear them outside (the same can’t be said for indoors so be wary) If you are someone who doesn’t like things being jammed in your ears like me, then this would be a GREAT thing to buy. When you first listen to music it feels really weird because you would not of known that it was coming from the sunglasses. Thanks for reading :) have a good day !
customer_reviews.author: Perran

customer_reviews.title: They have an amazing sound but poor quality glasses
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE the concept BUT the quality of workmanship is poor they won't last very long and fall apart
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: They stopped working after a few goes. They just refuse to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Dawkins

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: The very best in quality as you would expect from Bose, sound is excellent, way to use, only four stars for battery life as I feel this could be better but do not let this minor issue stop your purchase, a wonderful price of kit.
customer_reviews.author: Graham H.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I wear them when cycling , the sound quality is excellent and you can also hear whats happening around you while riding , so much safer than earpieces
customer_reviews.author: Ivan M.

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglasses ever
customer_reviews.text: Love these and wear them everywhere, audio quality is pretty decent, especially considering the size of the speakers, battery life is incredible, for about £200, would definetly recommend over a pair of rayban or designer sunglass. Look pretty snazzy, and you look pretty cool changing track while walking down the street. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Morgan B.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a Birthday present for my husband. He absolutely loves them. The sound quality is excellent and they look very classy. Great value for money and extremely good delivery service
customer_reviews.author: Elena1964

customer_reviews.title: Genius idea, fantastic sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband, he loves them. They are an absolute genius idea, sound quality and functionality are fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Julia Grouse

customer_reviews.title: Cool gadget for tech lovers
customer_reviews.text: Well, first gen of sunglasses with speakers but the quality of sound is great. From bad sides, looks bit platic, small battery and long battery charge time. Range of 120-150gbp sound way better to own it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Just love these no problems connecting sound very good be nice to get reading lenses but not available yet
customer_reviews.author: Annie C

customer_reviews.title: Packed in after 7 months and only wore them about 10 times
customer_reviews.text: They look good and the sound quality is great but after 7 months and having only wore them about 10 times they have packed up so now they are just an expensive pair of sunlglassses. Won't use this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Foster

customer_reviews.title: A great gimmick
customer_reviews.text: Great for listening to music and still being aware. A bit tinny sounding
customer_reviews.author: DTLW

customer_reviews.title: Its not what it says on the tin
customer_reviews.text: As sunglasses they are fine.sound quality is good.sound when answering calls is not good.and really this function is rubbish.overall I bought this product because it was Bose but it has not lived up to expectations
customer_reviews.author: Laura Mcardle

customer_reviews.title: No more ear buds
customer_reviews.text: So far very good. Impressed with the sound quality. Wish Bose supplied clear lenses at the same time and also offered prescription lenses or an approved partner for them.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price great quality, and the normal sound quality you would expect for Bose products. The only thing I would say is it’s a shame Bose never included a cleaning cloth with product for the glasses. Such a silly item to miss but is needed.
customer_reviews.author: donna barham

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant piece of kit!
customer_reviews.text: Great design, look and audio quality! Absolute gem of an item!
customer_reviews.author: Kev Harris

customer_reviews.title: cool
customer_reviews.text: good product don’t use them much at minute due to weather but great to wear only slight letdown is they sent very dark but more than happy with them thanks
customer_reviews.author: peter moody

customer_reviews.title: Poor noise quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money can still ear noise and people talking. Sent mine back after 2 days
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable device.
customer_reviews.text: These audio sunglasses perform exceptionally as sunglasses and as a music/audio book player.
customer_reviews.author: A. McC

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: Battery power is pretty poor not what I’ve expected from brand new frames with Bose name behind them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best quality and value for money
customer_reviews.text: As usual, Bose at its best. Love this gadget on my golfing and outdoor activities
customer_reviews.author: gumma sanyasi rao

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant. Just brilliant. Crisp music, not too loud but expected due to the design. Very good hands free, easy to setup and connect to. Highly recommend trying these for anyone interested in the product.
customer_reviews.author: emily and stephen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are just a amazing as you think. They sound great, look cool and are light
customer_reviews.author: Peter Griffin

customer_reviews.title: I'd write more but Ive been working all day
customer_reviews.text: They work. The bass you won't find in every track you play, but they aren't designed for that. Acoustic summer vibes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: The glasses feel really cheap the charge time is okay the sound is good but you can hear it from about 3 meters away
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: B-day present
customer_reviews.text: I see a face full with emotion and unexpected present
customer_reviews.author: Marius

customer_reviews.title: Use for everything
customer_reviews.text: Got them to test but they are so good I am keeping them
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: As always - Bose quality at Bose price
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Bose Frames Audio Sunglasses, Alto
product_meta.description: Style Name:Alto M/LMeet Bose Frames, the first audio sunglasses from Bose. Miniaturised Bose speakers—hidden in the temples—produce rich, immersive sound for you, while others hear practically nothing. It’s a revolutionary, open-ear audio experience that leaves you free to hear the world around you, all while discreetly listening to music. Choose from two timeless styles enriched with accents and materials, like gold-plated hinges. Alto offers a classic angular look in a larger size, while Rondo is more distinct with rounded lenses and a smaller fit. Bose Frames include a seamlessly integrated microphone for taking calls and accessing your phone’s virtual assistant. They block up to 99% of UVA/UVB rays. And they’re easy to use. Bluetooth connectivity provides hassle-free pairing. Plus, the Bose Connect app gives you the ability to personalise settings, access future updates and more. Every pair of Bose Frames is Bose AR enabled and ready to utilise the new technology when it’s available. Bose AR is an innovative, audio-only perspective on augmented reality that uses sound instead of sight to relay information about your world.
feature_bullets: Sunglasses with built-in Bose speakers that produce rich, immersive sound for you, while others hear practically nothing
Open-ear audio allows you to stay aware of your surroundings, while enjoying your music
With their classic angular shape and commanding lenses, Bose frames alto offer a new perspective on the most iconic silhouette in history for sunglasses
Angular lenses | Lens width: 54 mm | Bridge width: 21 mm | Temple length: 136 mm
An integrated microphone for clear calls and access to your phone’s virtual assistant
Block up to 99 perecnt of UVA/UVB rays
Personalised settings, access to future updates and more, available through the Bose connect app

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
